title: Summer House Anniversary Activation! + RHOA Marlo's Pumpkin Patch & Bethenny's Hot Takes & The OC!

description:
Danny covers Bethenny's hot takes on the Royals, this week's Summer House, which featured SO many layers, and ends by recapping this week's Real Housewives of Atlanta, which saw our ladies going to a pumpkin patch organized by Marlo. Plus, Danny binges The OC!


Summer House Recap: 4:00ish

RHOA Recap: 19:20ish
